content.new:
The atlasState message doesn't contain

- hand joint angles, velocities
- laser spindle joint angle, velocity
- head/hand IMUs

This requires us to match the packets together to do full body state estimation and overly complicates the communication

- head/hand IMUs

This requires us to match the packets together to do full body state estimation and overly complicates control, introduc

issue.title: Combine all IMU's and joints in the AtlasState message
